website_summaries.verdict: Cats love these freeze-dried salmon treats and they have the great health benefits of salmon, too.
pros: No preservatives and does not use farmed or genetically modified salmon
High in omega 3 and 6 fatty acids
cons: Some buyers noted certain bags had treats of lower quality

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product!! I ordered this two ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the same product!! I ordered this two months ago and it was pinkish and smelled strongly of fresh salmon. The cat went wild for it. I was convinced that this treat was nothing but wild salmon. When I reordered it was actually out of stock and I had to wait. When it finally came, I opened it and smelled chemicals but no salmon. Either the bag lining was heavily treated with chemicals, or the treats were. Also the treats were white and more dense than before. She ate two and lost interest. Also she threw up - maybe a coincidence. Not giving her any more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Found these at my local Whole Foods for much more, but tried them anyway and my cat is completely in love with these treats! We have tried other freeze dried salmon treats and I'm not sure if it is the type of salmon or what, but they were too rich and made my kitty sick. Not a problem with these. My kitty is so obsessed with them that she will push my hand out of the way as I am putting them down for her. She makes a little happy noise when she eats them that is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: CLGSF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Healthy Treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! I hates getting his nails clipped but we give him some of these treats before and after the nail cutting process. He used to snarl like a Tasmanian devil to have his nails trimmed. Now when he sees the treats he jumps to the spot where we cute his nails happily to get the treats and nail trim. They’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: My 14-year-old cats love this treat. I feed them only freeze-dried treats now that they're older and allergic to most cat food ingredients (such as chicken, duck, and yeast). I've ordered bags and bags of these over the years. One cat has cancer and intestinal motility problems and needs six !) pills a day, which he happily takes because of the treats. The other one has asthma, and I'm able to pill her and use the inhaler on her because of these treats. These truly are a godsend. Amazon used to deliver these to us here in India, but doesn't any longer, which is sad for me but terrible for the cats :-(
customer_reviews.author: manjitkarve

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: My cat can't eat chicken so I must buy treats w/o it but even the treats marked seafood or tuna, etc have chicken but a few don't. I've purchased freeze dried salmon in LESS than 1 oz pkg costing more per pkg than WildSide 1 ingredient, Salmon, 3 OZ PKG. What a great price and quality! I'm so happy I went Amazon and found WildSide. I will purchase it again and recommend it to all people with kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Jozef M

customer_reviews.title: The best quality freeze dried salmon!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 3 different brands of the freeze dried salmon and these are by far the best. Some brands you get pieces that are either way too big or are just crumbs, these are always fairly uniform and the perfect snack size for my cats. Also, I have had other brands where the skin is still on the salmon and nearly half of the bag the salmon is chewy and tough and my cats can't even eat it. These are perfectly dried and consistently the same perfect crunchiness. I won't be buying any other brands from now on!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Unger

customer_reviews.title: something a finicky cat LOVES
customer_reviews.text: I have two VERY picky kitties.....they turn UP their nose at about everything over time....food, treats, toys....but they LOVE these treats and I have to hide the package.....they know it and will chew open the package to get at the goodies.....I now keep these in a cupboard...HIGH up in the kitchen where they can't get to them.
customer_reviews.author: Annie "history buff"

customer_reviews.title: Styrofoam fish
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. I thought these would be something that resembled fish. These are actually like those styrofoam peanuts used for shipping, except they smell like fish! The bag weighs almost nothing! Our cat did not know what to do with these, and they ended up in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: R. Vomund

customer_reviews.title: Nice in theory, but cat won't eat them
customer_reviews.text: Reading all of the other reviews, I had hoped this would be a good gift for my sister's cat, however, he, unfortunately, doesn't like them. I was surprised to see that the treats were these little freeze-dried fish cubes. I'm not sure if they're too big or too dry, but they weren't a hit. He might just be picky. As with every cat, some treats work and others don't, so I would still recommend trying these out if you're looking for something special. They are somewhat pricy for cat treats, so if you have safer options it might be better to go with those if money is tight. The packaging is quite fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cats are Crazy for this
customer_reviews.text: They hear the bag and come running. I often crunch it up a bit and mix some into their breakfast or dinner (I feed 60% wet quality canned and 40% raw ATM), so they will eat most if not all their meal, and sometimes I give as a treat if I haven't already used it in their food that day. I think because I feed this (and other good food), my cats coats have become really shiny/glossy. They look great and I'm pretty happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: This is like cat crack!
customer_reviews.text: My cats go nuts for this! I used to buy it in a local pet shop, but when it closed I was so happy to see I could obtain it online. Great product (not that I've tried it :) ) but my two cats love it, and I've actually had some good luck training her to do basic commands with it. It's a little expensive, but super generously packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Suspicious Fish
customer_reviews.text: Just beware. I have been buying these Wildside Salmon treats for years. For some reason, these were backordered, which is the first time that's happened. When a bag finally became available it wasn't the same product. Instead of the light, freeze-dried cubes my cats loved the bag contained darker, rock-hard and perhaps stale product. Something was not right. Something chemical, perhaps. One cat reluctantly ate a few, the other wouldn't touch them. The cat that ate them suddenly developed irritation to his eyes. Not sure if the treats are to blame but I suspect as much. And as soon as I threw the bag away the eyes cleared. I am now sourcing new healthy treats.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline R.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite salmon treats
customer_reviews.text: I especially like that there isn’t salmon skin sticking fast to the pieces. With other brands, I have to peel off the skin so it won’t choke the kitties. I also appreciate that it isn’t packaged in plastic, it’s a good value, it’s made in the USA, and of course, the kitties go mad for it.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed this time around
customer_reviews.text: I've bought numerous bags of these that all four of my cats have loved. However, there was a marked difference in the most recent two bags I received. Instead of bags filled with the soft, square, nice sized pieces that my cats enjoy, these mainly had hard, strange shaped pieces that my cats wouldn't eat. I'll be trying another brand this time as these are too expensive to throw away because none of the kitty will eat them.
customer_reviews.author: temacan

customer_reviews.title: Cat finds acceptable subsititute
customer_reviews.text: needed to find acceptable subsitute for another salmon essentials product which suddenly jumped astronomically in price. This is ok! some pieces a little larger but then he only gets one. Outstanding snack/training treat for #catsonastring from Kodiak
customer_reviews.author: NZAKIA

customer_reviews.title: Best treats ever!
customer_reviews.text: All my kitties give these treats 5 stars! I like the fact that they are only salmon without added ingredients-and they are made in the USA. My cats are so addicted that they beg for these every night! I can feel good about feeding treats that are healthy--unlike some of the other treats available on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: dianeisis

customer_reviews.title: My cat liked them, at first
customer_reviews.text: The first day or two, my cat loved these treats. Since then, he has turned his nose up whenever I try to give him one. I think it is probably more of a problem with my cat than the treats because he's spoiled and can be pretty finicky.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat
customer_reviews.text: I'm certain my cat lives for these. Nothing makes her happier and she is so picky about her food. Over the years the freeze dried salmon has been her favorite treat and these are a great value. I order them consistently now. Although I did get one package where the pieces were very hard. She didnt touch those ones much.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats despite not being particularly interested in other fish products. The chunks of salmon are visibly higher quality in this product than in other snacks, which tend to contain more skin and "junk"--only solid chunks of meat in these. Great tool for bribing a scared or stubborn cat into compliance!
customer_reviews.author: NCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Cats go wild for these, and now they're made in the USA (not China). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: allen-c-in-biloxi

customer_reviews.title: Delicious treat for cats and now processed in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that Wildside freeze dried salmon treats are now processed in the USA rather than in China. My cats love them and they provide Omega 3s for my 18 year old cat who has arthritis in his hips.
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Staying power
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely finicky cats, who enjoy a type of treat for a while, then won’t touch it. These, however, never fail to please. I have them on subscription, as I know they’ll all get eaten.
customer_reviews.author: beanutputter

customer_reviews.title: nice product, but...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these, which pleased me. However, the little cubes have a tendency to break down after time, resulting in a bunch of loose powdery product in the bottom of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Earthgirl

customer_reviews.title: and 5 all like them. I even have one cat which doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the cat treats I purchase please some, but not all of my cats. For example, the dental treats I bought were rejected by our first two cats. We dusted them off to discover that cats 3, 4, and 5 all like them. I even have one cat which doesn't care much for any fishy foods we've tried giving him. However, these are the only treats so far which every single one of my cats love. They even try to steal them from each other. That makes them a great go to choice for me!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Formula Change? Off Batch?
customer_reviews.text: I had these before and my cats actually LOVED them, got them today, they smell different and a bit off, not just like fish like the last batch... cats won't even lick them now! Not sure what to say... but incredibly disappointed that they won't even take a look at these anymore...
customer_reviews.author: ry

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a cat food topper. I take three to four small pieces, crumple them into dust and mix it into my cats wet food. He still picks at his food so we now use this as a cat treat. It's costly, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: Yay! My cats are so glad these are back in stock. I e-mailed the company and apparently they were having problems with their equipment. Don't be thrown by the price. Since the fish is dried the package holds a lot of treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cats’ Favorite Treat!
customer_reviews.text: We call this Kitty Crack. My cats go bonkers over these! I have to break them up for my small kitty, because she is a delicate little flower. The best kitty treat I’ve ever found.
customer_reviews.author: JRStar

customer_reviews.title: Best on The Market
customer_reviews.text: I use these treats to crush and sprinkle over my cats' food - they are very picky. This way they eat almost anything they are offered. The Wild Side salmon bags contain almost exclusively frozen muscle tissue, the light colored pieces, which can easily be sprinkled. Most other brands have a lot of skin or fat tissue, the dark pieces, which are useless for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Greenwald

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried the salmon cat treats, but our two Siamese go wild over it. All I have to do is go near the kitchen cabinet where we keep the treats and one cat jumps onto a nearby table and the other cat literally climbs up my leg with excitement. So, happy cats, happy owners.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrold

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for years my cats freak over them and come a-runnin from down the street with one shake of the bag. This value pack saved me around $3 too!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Alsman

customer_reviews.title: Makes cats meow and dogs drool.
customer_reviews.text: My cats, foster kittens and foster cats love these. Our dogs love them too. They meow and beg for these. No odor and unlike some other freeze brands the pieces are not crushed into particle dust. Great for cats on a diet. I cant say enough about these treats. I sent some to friends with really picky cats and gave friends who foster cats. 27 of 30 cats who tried them devoured them. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: jen12

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as before. Made in China now!
customer_reviews.text: These were proudly made in usa before, but now have been outsourced to China. Will no longer buy them and find other treats for my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Dathon

customer_reviews.title: My cat highly recommends these.  =.=
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy 'We Pity The Kitties' freeze dried Alaskan salmon several times a month. Even though they were expensive, my cat went crazy for them, so I continued to buy them. Unfortunately, the manufacturer completely changed the product and my cat wouldn't no longer eat them. Looking for an alternative, I decided to try these. My cat seems to like these as much as the original ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cats favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved them. 3oz of freeze dried salmon is a lot more than I thought it was. The only way this would be better is if the pieces were more evenly sized.
customer_reviews.author: WolfKing

customer_reviews.title: One ingredient magic
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! First off, just one ingredient - meaning your furry friend isn’t dealing with God knows what in their food. Second, our cat loves it! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Consumer

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Go Nuts
customer_reviews.text: My two cats LOVE these treats, and the value size bag is a great bargain. I was paying twice as much for a more boutique brand of freeze-dried salmon treats, but my cats honestly couldn't tell any difference. Pure wild-caught salmon and nothing else, what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: She refused to eat it
customer_reviews.text: I was sorry that my cat doesn't like the item at all. I've given it to my son to give to friends with less persnickety felines.
customer_reviews.author: Pat C

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. After trying other brands have always come back to these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. I wish Amazon could put these on subscribe & save again.
customer_reviews.author: maxie

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: The cats love it. It's pricy but IZ love my feral cats & they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: justjam38

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed at all
customer_reviews.text: Trained my cat how to ring a bell with these. It just looks like cubes of salmon, super high quality. They seem to be pretty minimally processed, just look cut and freeze dried. Was looking for the healthiest, least junk filled treat for my cat and have ordered a few bags of these now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat crack
customer_reviews.text: I fell for her pleading eyes again. This cat treat is craved in our home. Our silent cat meows for a treat each morning. Great product. Fished ethically. But, beware, its addictive...
customer_reviews.author: N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My cats fav treat
customer_reviews.text: It's their favorite treat by far but it's so expensive so they only get these on special occasions lol.
customer_reviews.author: Flickertheflame

customer_reviews.title: Sammie approved
customer_reviews.text: Nice consistent sizes of product not shredded and crumbly good price and my cat approves
customer_reviews.author: Leslie page

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes but half the bag is crumbs so money wasted!
customer_reviews.text: Cat loved them at first. They were nice fresh nice pieces. They used to come in a sturdy box now in an envelop, I assume they get crushed in delivering cuz now half the bag is super tiny crumbs and dust that she cant eat.. Please go back to shipping out in a box cuz cat likes..
customer_reviews.author: nitakp

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: According to my cat these are the best treats he’s ever had. Absolutely his favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Nonni

customer_reviews.title: Cats FAVORITE treats!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats FAVORITE treats. They wait by my table nightly for these .
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: They loved this brand. I've tried a couple others but this is the best so far. Nice size pieces and hardly any crumbs. They are also all meat instead of a bunch of skin which my cats aren't fond of. Happy I tried this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Casices

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat won’t east any treats but these! We now have them on subscription! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this salmon treat. Just dried salmon; no additives.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Irresistible for Cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat knows what's in this package and comes running when he hears the telltale crinkle. He loves these so much he'd go headfirst into the bag if I'd let him, and will actually take the treat from my fingers. The only criticism I have is that the shipping seems to crush/pulverize some of the treats, so when you get to the bottom of the bag it's tiny crumbs that are best suited for pouring over food or putting into the cat's food bowl alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Paws Up!
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered these at my vet's office. They are truly a healthy snack; have no preservatives; and don't require refrigeration - great if you're traveling with your cat, at a cat show, etc. My vet is holistic and sells only the premium healthy stuff, so no guilt, thank you very much. My cats adore these and look forward to their daily "salmon cookie" treats, which they receive whether they deserve them or not:).
customer_reviews.author: Burmese Boys

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: This is my cats' favorite treat hands-down. Both really dig the dried bonito flakes, but don't act quite as possessed as they do with these salmon nuggets! Plus, this brand is quality everything - which makes my felines kitty connoisseurs! [yes, my kitties are also super perfect, too :]
customer_reviews.author: P-Dog

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite treat ever
customer_reviews.text: My cats favorite treat. A bit expensive but high quality treat
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it! At 12 and 15, eating issues have cropped up... crushing and sprinkling on food really works. Wish there was a larger amount in bag, but happy to have such a great treat.
customer_reviews.author: ivyhill

customer_reviews.title: WIN!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like crack for my cats! They crave it fortnightly!
customer_reviews.author: Lena Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats LOVE these treats. I've been buying them for 6 years now. Their coats are so shiny. My girl kitty won't eat any other treats now. She doesn't like fake fillers. These are some of the healthiest snacks you could treat your fur baby with.
customer_reviews.author: Salina

customer_reviews.title: A premium quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, big pieces (not crumbles or broken pieces like other brands) of wild salmon, good enough to rehydrate and make into a salad! My cat loves this and doesnt want any other treat
customer_reviews.author: crabs

customer_reviews.title: Food sensitive kitty gives 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat has a food allergy so she can’t have most treats. However, she loves these! So happy i found these to reward my special needs, deaf, and food sensitive kitty. Hypoallergenic treats are surprisingly hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Ansley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kitty treats
customer_reviews.text: Crispy chunks, both my kittens like them a lot. When they were barely 3 months old, I had to split the bigger pieces (no problem: they crack easily), but now they're very happy to eat them whole. They're very light, so 3 oz includes a LOT of treats. The only treats they like more are the salmon flakes that make up. And the that has a heavenly smell -- makes me crave eating bagels with cream cheese and lox.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: My kittens and my 14 yr old love these both as treats or crumbled on canned food
customer_reviews.author: Val K

customer_reviews.title: One of my dog's absolute favorites
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these treats. Sometimes they can be hard to find in pet stores, so it's great that I can order them online. They do smell like fish, but they treats aren't oily and the smell isn't strong at all. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Josh F

customer_reviews.title: Cat will come running for these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. He goes crazy for them. My dogs like them, too, but they don't get to enjoy them as often as the cat does. I like them because I can break them apart into smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Beardiegrrl

customer_reviews.title: Our cat ignored us for years, and was terrified ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat ignored us for years, and was terrified of a visiting dog, until we ordered him these treats. Now he stands in the kitchen and meows for salmon treats ALL DAY LONG. Buy at your own risk!!!!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: My kitties go crazy for these. I feed them ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitties go crazy for these. I feed them sparingly though (1 or 2 at most), too many of these treats can cause stomach issues if your cat is sensitive to rich foods.
customer_reviews.author: Anelisa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down my cat's favorite treats I have ever given them. All 3 of them go nuts when they see this bag. They are pretty good size treats, some i break apart. There is not much dust, definitely a lot less than other brands I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie27

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves these. I love that they are all natural and don't make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product durability lacking
customer_reviews.text: The pets love it these, but a good quarter to half a cup of the product is just dust.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Foote

customer_reviews.title: Our cat freaking loves these things!
customer_reviews.text: We have a one year old rescue tabby cat who freaks out over these treats. We actually used them as rewards for her using the scratching post, and she just loves them. Seem to be healthier than the typical store brand cat treats.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Nichole Chiles

customer_reviews.title: my female cat loves it but my male cat not so much
customer_reviews.text: my female cat loves it but my male cat not so much but I will continue to buy it for the girl cat
customer_reviews.author: LBG

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this treat
customer_reviews.text: My cats (and dogs) go crazy for this freeze dried salmon. It's a wonderful treat for them. I have used other packaged treats that don't even compare to this one. I can by this locally from a high end pet store for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this freeze dried salmon. She will come out of hiding simply by rustling the bag. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Makabe

customer_reviews.title: Poe say GIVE ME MORE!
customer_reviews.text: Poe is addicted to these. There is no turning back. He must have some salmon every day and this is his jam.
customer_reviews.author: mzplacedinphl

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the fast shipping. My cat loves these things !
customer_reviews.author: K. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE these, and I love that they are getting ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE these, and I love that they are getting pure protein without any additives. We've bought this brand for months and will continue doing so!
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Cats luv this stuff! and made in USA. ...
customer_reviews.text: Cats luv this stuff ! and made in USA ...finally... Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: boxer mom

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my cat's favorite treats. I like it because it has not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my cat's favorite treats. I like it because it has not GMO's in it and is Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Teddy

customer_reviews.title: A WINNER (UNLESS MY CATS START GLOWING IN THE DARK)
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard, cats love them. However, I am getting a little concerned about seafood what with Fukushima and the pillage of the ocean. Who knows what some of this stuff is made of...BUT Wildside my cats do not hesitate to eat.
customer_reviews.author: realtime

customer_reviews.title: My cats did not want these at all
customer_reviews.text: The product is almost weightless and white in color. I tried to give it to my two cats, and neither ate even a nibble. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chuntu

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift. Her cats don't like treats but they loved WildSide Salmon. She was amazed. It's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great treat without other ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these! I have to buy only treats that don't have other stuff in them because one of my cats has renal failure and these are great. She loves them and so do my other two cats.
customer_reviews.author: Josh D.

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES Wild salmon treats. I used to ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES Wild salmon treats. I used to buy them from a local pet shop all the time. We moved to another state and no one carries them. So when I want something I usually check with amazon first. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cat snack
customer_reviews.text: My cats beg for these every time I go near the drawer where they’re kept!
customer_reviews.author: J. Purdon

customer_reviews.title: Costly, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's a little expensive, but my 7 cats love it!!! If your cat like fish, they will love these
customer_reviews.author: patricia j connell

customer_reviews.title: Salmon Appetizer
customer_reviews.text: Both my dog and cat enjoy these fresh freeze dried salmon bites.
customer_reviews.author: Amaura

customer_reviews.title: A good item
customer_reviews.text: Used for cats and dogs Be careful about your order because there seems no way to stop deliveries of the order
customer_reviews.author: suzanne willis

customer_reviews.title: Cat Crack
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these things... but they stink really bad.. they are freeze dried little salmon bites that yes, feel and look like Styrofoam. But my cat goes crazy for them; he only has his two lower canine teeth but is still able to eat them fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our 16yr old cat is in love w these treats!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "kill" the treats
customer_reviews.text: wildly popular with all my cats and veterinarian recommended I will not be caught without when the need arises. Great for positive reinforcement, cats are so enthusiastic they "kill" the treats by shaking them.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfwerk

customer_reviews.title: My cats (and I) love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cats absolutely love these treats. I love that they are wild caught salmon with nothing in them but the salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Sparky wouldn't eat, wouldn't take the meds in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sparky wouldn't eat, wouldn't take the meds in the cat treat anymore - this literally saved his life and he's still eating a month later!! So grateful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Delicious treat
customer_reviews.text: My cat would kill for this. We have to make sure not to give her too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DIPPER SAYS "YUM!"  These treats are the key to getting your cat to do ANUTHING!
customer_reviews.text: My cat Dipper says "These are a BIG YUM!" He will do anything -- swallow pills, put up with blood-glucose testing, fetch pompoms -- to get one of these little cubes of dried salmon. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Powers

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES these treats. They are naturally prepared which is not really common in treats now a days.
customer_reviews.author: Susana C.

customer_reviews.title: This is crack for cats, but thats good!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat Hyde goes nuts. Like full blown crack addict nuts for these treats. He'll literally start licking and throwing himself at me for more. Poor kitty, he'd never survive as a lonely girl in the big city 😂
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: A great appetizer for your gormet kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I like it because my cats love it! My male practically lives on it, uses them as an "appetizer", lol, before supper.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this treat!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two very picky eaters but they love this treat!
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Washington

customer_reviews.title: Cats got very sick after eating these,
customer_reviews.text: Cats got very sick after eating these, we tried it twice a couple days apart to make sure they were the cause
customer_reviews.author: AFDP

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat, absolutely, LOVES these treats. And I have a pretty picky cat. Although a bit pricey, they are a favorite amongst cats that I have given to, especially my own cat. Highly recommend and if you buy the size for dogs, it is a bit less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pappas

product_meta.title: WildSide Salmon Cat Treats - 3 oz
product_meta.description: Freeze Dried Wild Alaskan Salmon treats for Cats. Our premium quality Wild Alaskan Salmon treats are bursting with salmon flavor that will drive your Cat or Kitten WILD. Our Treats are made from a single ingredient, Wild Salmon. Veterinarian and Pussycat approved.
feature_bullets: Not From Farmed Or Genetically Modified Salmon
Great Source Of Omega 3 And Omega 6

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
